sections.title: The FINITE STRING Newsletter 1980 ACL Membership List ACL Membership List
paragraphs: The following is a complete listing of the approximately 900 members (both individual and institutional) of the Association for Computational Linguistics, as of December 1980. The first eleven pages are U.S. members, ordered alphabetically by state, and within state by zip code. The next seven pages are foreign members, ordered alphabetically by country, and within country by city name or postal code.
